text: Anand assembly constituency (આણંદ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Anand district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments # Anand Taluka (Part) Villages – Lambhvel, Jol, Valasan, Sandesar, Meghva Gana, Gana, Vans Khiliya, Jitodiya, Hadgood, Jakhariya, Navli, Khandhali, Anand (M), Mogri, Gamdi, Bakrol, Vallabh Vidyanagar (M), Karamsad (M), Vithal Udyognagar (INA) ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 252|| 131467 || 124572 || 1 || 256040 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *1972 - Bhupatsinh Vaghela, Indian National Congress *1975 - Ranchhodbhai Solanki, Indian National Congress *1980 - Ranchhodbhai Solanki, Indian National Congress *1985 - Ranchhodbhai Solanki, Indian National Congress *1990 - Ghanshyam Patel, Janta Party *1995 - Dilipbhai Patel, Bharatiya Janta Party *1998 - Dilipbhai Patel, Bharatiya Janta Party *2002 - Dilipbhai Patel, Bharatiya Janta Party *2007 - Jyotsanaben Patel, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Dilipbhai Manibhai Patel, Bharatiya Janata Party *2014 - Rohit Patel (by poll), Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Kantibhai Sodhaparmar , Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Anand district
title: Anand (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
